content.raw: Being pendantic is not a bad thing but we should consider that for a large majority of users the 'GPS' word is probably crucial to find the sensor that they plan to use. So my vote goes to somewhat maintain the word GPS, but find a way of adding the GNSS concept. Brainstorming: GPS/GNSS, GNSS-GPS, MultiSatelliteGPS,  ...
content.html: Being pendantic is not a bad thing but we should consider that for a large majority of users the 'GPS' word is probably crucial to find the sensor that they plan to use. So my vote goes to somewhat maintain the word GPS, but find a way of adding the GNSS concept. Brainstorming: GPS/GNSS, GNSS-GPS, MultiSatelliteGPS, ...
